title: Issues when running MLflow UI inside a terminal in vs code on MAC Monterey v. 12.3.1
body:
I am running mlflow ui in a terminal inside vscode to see the models that have been produced after following the following steps: https://mlflow.org/docs/latest/tutorials-and-examples/tutorial.html until the point "Comparing the Models".

The error in the terminal reads:

[2022-04-12 13:46:42 +0200] [3264] [INFO] Starting gunicorn 20.1.0
[2022-04-12 13:46:42 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:42 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:43 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:43 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:44 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:44 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:45 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:45 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:46 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:46 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:47 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Can't connect to ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
Running the mlflow server failed. Please see the logs above for details.

I also tried to run: mlflow ui --h 0.0.0.0 but then I get:

[2022-04-12 13:46:42 +0200] [3264] [INFO] Starting gunicorn 20.1.0
[2022-04-12 13:46:42 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('0.0.0.0, 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:42 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:43 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('0.0.0.0, 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:43 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:44 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('0.0.0.0', 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:44 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:45 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('0.0.0.0, 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:45 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:46 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('0.0.0.0', 5000)
[2022-04-12 13:46:46 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2022-04-12 13:46:47 +0200] [3264] [ERROR] Can't connect to ('0.0.0.0, 5000)
Running the mlflow server failed. Please see the logs above for details.
